New Records: Cape Verde won an Africa Cup of Nations knockout tie for the first time in their history
Key Match Events: Ryan Mendes scored a late penalty to secure Cape Verde's victory
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde coach Pedro 'Bubista' Brito believes his side can go further in the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was drifting towards extra time
Others: The Blue Sharks will face either Morocco or South Africa in the quarter-final
